reviews.review: Survive with friends ruin this game.  They need separate game modes like a ranked and casual wherein the casual mode is the only mode that allows SWF.  You'd think theyd have done it by now since the games been out for years now, but no.  Also the game is unoptimized and it gets worse and worse over time.  I crash more now than i ever did back in beta.  I rarely play the game anymore due to crashing, DC's, and SWF.  Whether you are a survivor paired with SWF or a killer vs'ing a 4 man swf it ruins teh game.  The game was built around having randoms queue up and when they threw in the SWF to appease survivors its been a balance mess since.

Shut your fkin chase music or make it less
I'm fked up playing Rin because of chase music
Very fun game! Lots of fun with friends. Would recommend this to anyone. 10/10

After over 1,500 hours I can safely say this game is cancer. The devs know it and they encourage the toxicity, The perk system is an absolute grind-fest, same goes for the rift. Its based on tapping into people's gambling addictions and does not create a fun experience, people only return to this because they're a giant in a tiny pool of horror games and they know they can milk their customers. This game needs to either be cancelled or taken over by a more competent and less greedy dev team. Playing this game CAN AND WILL cause intense distress, between the addicting mechanics and horrible playerbase one can't help but come back for more suffering. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. I want it to die so I can move on with my life. But I cannot leave because there's always a new rift archive tome whatever challenge is coming up soon. 

UPDATE:

After putting countless more hours into this game I can confirm it is still a broken POS. Rank reset is cancer and will be the end of this games dwindling player base. I have reason to suspect that rank reset is an excuse to hide their poor matchmaking. Matches are full of bugs, glitches, exploits and lag. Players abuse broken gameplay mechanics. SWF ruins the experience and I would HAPPILY wait 2x as long just to avoid being paired against them. SWF ignores rank and allows smurfs to troll the game. Devs never listen to user reports. RNG is NO WAY to run a game. It makes sense for some aspects but it is aweful and still allows for many exploits and memorization (which is why we have RNG hatch spawns in the first place). Please do the world a favor and stop releasing new games until y'all can fix this hot pile of garbage!

Update as of patch 4.1.2:
THIS GAME SOMEHOW GOT WORSE. MMR has never been done so wrong, these devs need to get their ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô• together and decide if they want a competitive game or a casual one, because MMR matchmaking DOES NOT work in a casual game, we should not be encouraging people to exploit OP perks and infinite loops and slugging/ tunneling to gain a competitive advantage. Killers CANNOT counter DS, survivors CANNOT counter a killer deadset on tunneling them to literal death. THIS IS NOT COMPETITIVE, please devs, I beg you guys to just fix these broken perks and then try to make a decent matchmaking system. No matchmaking system can work if the gameplay is broken. I feel really bad for new players getting paired with Rank 1 sweaty killers, because they don't deserve this treatment, but the devs made this a reality with the MMR system.

don't read this review for an excuse to not play this, but i do want you to think long and hard about playing this because there's only online and i don't know if the community is still toxic or not i haven't played it in a long time but there's one killer that makes the game so much harder to like because that killer has ranged attacks and as a survivor you cant attack and as much as i hate to say it this game was good and was just knocked over in the end. i'm serious when i say this game had a good concept and it could have worked had it been executed the right way but i just feel like it was executed in the worst way imaginable and it makes me so sad to say that i simply do not recommend this game. but again if you want to play this game don't let me stop, you in fact if you do end up playing this i hope you are used to being in toxic communities because oh boy do i feel like this game is toxic. have a nice day reader

As a huge fan of the horror genre and particularly 80's slasher films this has been on of the funnest games I've ever played. You can slay as a Killer or work in a group to live as a Survivor depending on your mood and both modes are totally enjoyable. If you love horror and video games you will love Dead by Daylight.

I'm addicted to this game and it's more fun playing with friends and i do recommend this game for everyone but this game has lots of down sides that can be resolve like balancing the game for killers and survivors. Overall , I LOVE THIS GAME !

There is a learning curve on this game. Make sure you play the tutorial otherwise you will be completely lost when starting out. It would be nice if the survivor characters would be able to fight back at least a little. Friday the 13th lets the survivors attack Jason which makes it more fun. 

One of the cool things about this game are the unique DLC characters that they add. I was able to get Ash from Evil Dead and it is voice acted by Bruce Campbell which is really cool.

Dead by Daylight. Um jogo que eu tenho jogado a algum tempo e nunca parei pra fazer uma review. Na minha opini√£o, √© um dos melhores jogos de terror multiplayer a pelo menos 2 ou 3 anos. Jogos que foram lan√ßados recentemente como Sexta-feira 13 e Last Year, n√£o conseguiu passar esse jogo, simplesmente porque o jogo √© divertido e principalmente com amigos. Se voc√™ √© um daqueles que joga esse jogo muito competitivamente, com certeza n√£o √© pra voc√™. Esse jogo n√£o tem ainda um sistema de ranking moldado, ele s√≥ separa os jogadores mais experientes dos mais novatos. E sim, voc√™ passa um tempo esperando um lobby se voc√™ tem uma internet horr√≠vel ou se voc√™ mora no Acre (nada contra quem mora no Acre kk). Em geral, o jogo √© muito bom e eu recomendo bastante. N√£o h√° nada como Pay 2 win ou Rank system complexo. √â um jogo bem tenso e bem divertido de modo geral al√©m de f√°cil de aprender e possibilidades que voc√™ tem nesse jogo.

El juego es muy hermoso y adictivo, es una joya de juego el problema son los servidores.

Really fun game once you get the gist of it. A lot of people complain about the toxicity but I really haven't come by that much of it, but maybe I'm just numb to a lot of it since I play league. Fun game to play casually, took me a bit to fully understand how the rank and leveling systems work but they're pretty simple once you play the game for a bit. Seems like a lot of negativity in the game is focused in higher ranks, so I'll probably just continue playing casually and for fun.
